definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
beaten and wiped over the floor (idiom); to fail utterly/a crushing defeat/failed and in a hopeless position
First epistle of St John/also written 約翰一書|约翰一书

sentences.english: Meet 1 & 2 Sofa at the Shanghai InteriorLifestyle exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 壹和貳沙發在上海時尚家居展亮相。

sentences.english: Clerked at One-and -OneClothes Store in charge of sales, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，在壹加壹服裝店當店員，負責銷售。

sentences.english: We will reimburse the customer for any or damage.
sentences.chinese: 我們將賠償顧客所受稻的壹茄筍失何損害。

sentences.english: Beauty of love, always as the miserable Bana general.
sentences.chinese: 悽美的愛情，總是如彼岸花壹般的悽慘。

sentences.english: Go way, do not remember looking back.
sentences.chinese: 走了壹條路地時候，記得別回頭看。

sentences.english: Life is like a book, each page is so wonderful.
sentences.chinese: 人生就像壹本書，每壹頁都是那麼的精彩。

sentences.english: Clerked at Oneand One Clothes Store in ge of sales, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，在壹加壹服裝店當店員，負責銷售。

sentences.english: Jn. 3:13 Do not marvel, brothers, if the world hates you.
sentences.chinese: 約壹三13弟兄們，世人若恨你們，不要以爲希奇。

sentences.english: My idea in starting the One Foundation was that we shouldn't compare ourselves to others.
sentences.chinese: 我的想法是做壹基金，我們不需要和別人做比較。

sentences.english: He was a full time photographer in Next magazine and Ming Pao Weekly Magazine.
sentences.chinese: 曾任《壹週刊》及《明報週刊》全職攝影師。

sentences.english: Since that day probably everyone knows that I have had an idea called The One Foundation.
sentences.chinese: 在這事後大家可能都知道我在想了一個方法叫壹基金。

sentences.english: There is always a person in your heart in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 總有那麼壹個人，住在妳心底的角落。

sentences.english: Shenzhen one hour zone, Huanggang port 45 minutes drive.
sentences.chinese: 深圳壹小時生活圈，皇崗口岸45分鐘車程。

sentences.english: Two patients developed distant metastasis, one in bone and one in brain.
sentences.chinese: 有兩例發生遠端轉移，壹在腦，壹在骨頭。

sentences.english: Beauty of love, always as the miserable Bana general.
sentences.chinese: 悽美地愛情，老是如彼岸花壹般地悽慘。

sentences.english: Ur pride has built a wall, so strong.
sentences.chinese: 妳的驕傲曾築起了壹堵那樣堅固的牆。

definition: orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
Yuanbao district of Dandong city 丹東市|丹东市[Dan1 dong1 shi4], Liaoning
a silver or gold ingot/mock ingot (burnt as offering in worship)/a name for ancient currency/a rare genius
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
Daguan district of Anqing city 安慶市|安庆市[An1 qing4 shi4], Anhui
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2

definition: academy of classical learning (Tang Dynasty - Qing Dynasty)
